detaileddescription.para: This is the scripting of FyS Online (MMORPG) game. It contains all the scripts of the contenders, and attacks that exist in the game (in a separate submodule).
The submodule containing all the scripts that are going to be stored and retrieved by the services via CML (see below).
This is a library that is used in order to retrieve data from the database, and cache it in order to not have expensive db call. More information ../docs/CML.md "here"
